name: Pylon: Rogue
description: Take all of the combat of an Action-RPG and cram it into a non-stop action game with RPG character progression, add a bit of satire, and just one life to make it to the end, and thatâ€™s Pylon: Rogue.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 and Above Processor: Intel or AMD Dual-Core 2.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 260 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 5770 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 and Above Processor: Intel or AMD Quad-Core 2.4GHz or Higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 5850 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
